attributes.action: Introduce a fair and reasonable road pricing policy with all revenue raised used to improve public transport and reduce carbon emmissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The aim is to create a road pricing policy acceptable to the majority of road users. This should result in all revenue raised being directly used to improve all forms of public transport and significantly reduce carbon emmisions from any type of transport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
